desc: 戦斧ディアボリックファングの刃の欠片

dictionary.lore: A fragment of the edge of the of Barbatos's beloved axe, the Diabolic Fang. Made of a material unknown to the people of Elgaia, this fragment can deal enough damage on its own to account for the Diabolical Fang's incredible destructive power. When used to create armor along with other materials, it is said to have an incredible effect on the fighting spirit of the wearer.

name: 暴斧の欠刃

usage.name: ディアボリックファング
